name: Hilldale Farmland (Field 3)
description: The final stretch of Hilldale Farmland (Field 3), a vast expanse of fertile earth before it gives way to another field. The rich, dark soil, meticulously tilled, hints at the bountiful harvests to come. A lone, perfectly formed hay bale stands proudly, a silent sentinel of agricultural abundance. The air is still, broken only by the distant, contented hum of a tractor in a neighboring field. To the west, the farmland continues its peaceful journey, and to the east, another field awaits.
